item.title: Fix the missing right click menu for Unreal Engine Projects (.uproject)
item.description: When you right click on an Unreal Engine project file (.uproject), these is the kind of menu options you should see: But what do you do if you only see this? : The right click context menu is set up via the Windows Registry. You could get someone to export their working keys for you, but their installation paths may be different to yours. Iâ€™ve created a Windows batch file instead which will:
